participant_1.name: Eli
participant_1.personality: Introverted and imaginative, with a strong affinity for fantasy.
participant_1.background: I hate talking to people. Nachos are my favorite food. I play D&D. I should have been born a prince. I believe dragons are real.

participant_2.name: Maya
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, thrives on excitement and new experiences.
participant_2.background: I work graveyard in a hotel. I like to surf every chance I get. I love the snow. My favorite actor is Robert De Niro.

content.text: Me too! What's your favorite way to make them?
I like to make them with lots of cheese, guacamole, and sour cream.
That sounds delicious! I'm not much of a cook, but I can make a mean batch of nachos.
You should share the recipe with me sometime!
I will! What do you do for fun?
I like to surf, snow ski, and play D&D.
I've never been skiing, but I've always wanted to try it.
It's a lot of fun! And it's a great way to get some exercise.
I can imagine! What's your favorite D&D class?
I like to play a paladin. They're always ready to fight for justice.
Paladins are cool! I've always wanted to play a wizard.
Wizards are fun too! They can cast all sorts of powerful spells.
I know, right? I think I might try playing a wizard next time I play D&D.
You should! I'm sure you'd have a lot of fun.
